ygData.subject: Re: Please help me :(
ygData.msgSnippet: Not always true.. I ve hit creature that conned red for my lvl 21 group mate while I was lvl 19.  Which means the creature was probably 24 (that right?)..  But
ygData.messageBody:
Not always true.. I've hit creature that conned red for my lvl 21 group mate
while I was lvl 19. Which means the creature was probably 24 (that
right?).. But I've also fought an NPC who is lvl 24 and have never come
close to doing dmg to him. So while lvl is the most important, it's not
always the only factor.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


.
>
>There are only some critters you can hit that are red (the really should
>consider "pink" since they are in the first level of red above yellow
>COnsiders).
>
>- Ziffnab
>
